distroi.model.model module

Module defining the implementation of a model, from which observables matching observational data can be calculated.

class distroi.model.model.Model

Bases: object

Defines a model consisting of a single radiative transfer component and possible additional geometric components.

Variables

  • components (dict[str, RTComp | GeomComp]) – Dictionary containing the names of model components within the Model scope and the corresponding component objects.

  • params (dict[str, Param]) – Dictionary containing the names of model parameters within the Model scope and the corresponding parameter objects.

add_components(comp: distroi.model.rt_comp.rt_comp.RTComp | distroi.model.geom_comp.geom_comp.GeomComp | list[distroi.model.rt_comp.rt_comp.RTComp | distroi.model.geom_comp.geom_comp.GeomComp], names: Optional[list[str]] = None) → None

Add a component or list of components to the model. The parameters of the component will be named accordingly in the components dict. If no names are specified, sensible defaults will be chosen.
